item.title: Auditing JPA entities with Hibernate Envers
item.description: In a recent project we had the need to keep a record of the changes made in every domain entity. That is, we need to insert a new record on an audit table every time an entity is created/updated/deleted. This is not the first time this problem arises. I think this is a the case of a cross-cutting concern, that fits well into the aspect-oriented programming area.
